mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM gov_house_model t WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT gov_house_model_seq.CURRVAL ID FROM DUAL

UPDATE gov_house_model SET isDeleted =1 WHERE id in
#{o.id}

UPDATE gov_house_model SET house_types=#{houseTypes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, info_types=#{infoTypes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, info_name=#{infoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, information_res_id=#{informationResId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, infor_code=#{inforCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_modified=#{timeModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , department=#{department,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, stime=#{stime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etime=#{etime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, options=#{options,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, value1=#{value1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value2=#{value2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value3=#{value3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value4=#{value4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value5=#{value5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value6=#{value6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value7=#{value7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value8=#{value8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value9=#{value9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},value10=#{value10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value11=#{value11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value12=#{value12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value13=#{value13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value14=#{value14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value15=#{value15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value16=#{value16,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value17=#{value17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value18=#{value18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value19=#{value19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value20=#{value20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value21=#{value21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value22=#{value22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value23=#{value23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value24=#{value24,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value25=#{value25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value26=#{value26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value27=#{value27,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value28=#{value28,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value29=#{value29,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value30=#{value30,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT gov_house_model.info_types, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(distinct gov_data_list.data_element_id) data_element_ids FROM gov_house_model LEFT JOIN gov_data_list ON gov_house_model.id = gov_data_list.house_model_id WHERE gov_house_model.house_types = 1 AND gov_house_model.info_types < 3 AND gov_house_model.isDeleted = 0 group by gov_house_model.info_types

SELECT gov_house_model.info_name, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(distinct gov_data_list.data_element_id) data_element_id FROM gov_house_model LEFT JOIN gov_data_list ON gov_house_model.id = gov_data_list.house_model_id WHERE gov_house_model.house_types = 1 AND gov_house_model.info_types = 3 AND gov_house_model.isDeleted = 0 group by gov_house_model.information_res_id,gov_house_model.info_name

SELECT gov_house_model.info_types, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(distinct gov_data_list.data_element_id) data_element_ids FROM gov_house_model LEFT JOIN gov_data_list ON gov_house_model.id = gov_data_list.house_model_id WHERE gov_house_model.house_types = 2 AND gov_house_model.isDeleted = 0 group by gov_house_model.info_types

SELECT gov_house_model.info_types, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(distinct gov_data_list.data_element_id) data_element_ids FROM gov_house_model LEFT JOIN gov_data_list ON gov_house_model.id = gov_data_list.house_model_id WHERE gov_house_model.house_types = 4 AND gov_house_model.isDeleted = 0 group by gov_house_model.info_types

SELECT gov_house_model.info_name, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(distinct gov_data_list.data_element_id) data_element_id FROM gov_house_model LEFT JOIN gov_data_list ON gov_house_model.id = gov_data_list.house_model_id WHERE gov_house_model.house_types = 5 AND gov_house_model.isDeleted = 0 group by gov_house_model.info_name

SELECT gov_house_model.information_res_id informationResId, WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(distinct gov_data_list.data_element_id) data_element_id FROM gov_house_model LEFT JOIN gov_data_list ON gov_house_model.id = gov_data_list.house_model_id WHERE gov_house_model.house_types = #{houseTypes} AND gov_house_model.isDeleted = 0 group by gov_house_model.information_res_id
